page.summary:
The full Sparx Application Platform Release can be downloaded for a free 30-day evaluation period.
Please review the requirements first, make sure you have a JDK installed, then click one of the links below to download and install the evaluation kit.
Kit Size Instructions
5 mb
Binaries only (no app server, samples, or documentation).
30 mb
Complete Sparx evaluation kit for Windows. Includes Resin application server, Sparx binaries, introductory whitepaper, developer guides, and sample applications.
30 mb
Complete Sparx evaluation kit for Linux, UNIX, and MacOS. Includes Resin application server, Sparx binaries, introductory whitepaper, developer guides, and sample applications.
page.section:
Sparx includes hundreds of pages of both online (HTML) and offline (PDF) documentation. To get the most out of the sample applications described below, please review the documents described below and follow along with the samples either online or on your own servers.
Document Samples Covered Purpose
Sparx Introduction (White Paper) All
Introduces you to all of the major concepts in Sparx. Download and read this document before delving into the Sparx Developers Guides below.
Sparx Developers Guide Volume I Hello, Library
Describes the two primary means for evaluating Sparx -- online and offline. Furthermore, it explains how to install Sparx onto your local servers and how to peruse the source code online. It then introduces Sparx by describing most of the functionality and walking the reader through the development of two full-scale sample applications hello and library (Hello World and the Sparx Library).
Sparx Developers Guide Volume II Cura
Provides examples that demonstrate the advanced functions available in Sparx. This is primarily done by walking the reader through the implementation of a sophisticated project management application called Cura.
